name: Forsaken Woods
description:
On a day full of hot summer sunshine,
The sudden accident turned the trip with friends into a nightmare.

When you come to your senses, you're left alone in a strange forest.
There, you try to escape this place with your friends,
Unpredictable risks prevent you.

You are at a loss who to trust and where to go.
Your choice will make the key to escape.

an outline
Forsaken Woods is a text-based game of choice.
This is a forest full of danger, and you have to try to survive here.
But not all choices guarantee survival.

An unpredictable ending awaits you.
Among them, you may be one step closer to the truth.
But this game is not just about survival.
It contains an immersive story that is made according to your choice.

Keep playing and get to the truth.
